amendment.description: To include entrepreneurship as a local educational agency allowable use of funds under title II.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2199 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2199 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Graham to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5097) To include entrepreneurship as a local educational agency allowable use of funds under title II.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2199 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2199 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Graham to Amendment SA 2089.
